org.wso2.carbon.repository.api

Class ResourcePath

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wso2.carbon.repository.api.ResourcePath

  • public class ResourcePath
extends Object
    This class represents resource paths used inside the repository. i.e. paths in the form /c1/c2/r1;version:2;view:1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ResourcePath(String rawPath)
      Create a resource path with a row path.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Append a component to the current path.

      Return the complete path.

      Get the parameter value.
      String getPath()
      Return the path component, without any parameters.
      String getPathWithVersion()
      Return the path with version, if there is no version, just return the path.
      boolean isCurrentVersion()
      Check whether the path is not a version-ed path.
      boolean parameterExists(String key)
      Check whether a parameter with the provided key exist.
      void setParameter(String key, String value)
      Set the parameter.
      String toString()
      The path to string, same as getCompletePath

        public String getPath()
        Return the path component, without any parameters. (the path component before the ';' token).
        Returns:
        the path value.

      • parameterExists

        public boolean parameterExists(String key)
        Check whether a parameter with the provided key exist.
        Parameters:
        key - the parameter key.
        Returns:
        true, if the parameter exists, false otherwise.

        public void appendPath(String pathToAppend)
        Append a component to the current path.
        Parameters:
        pathToAppend - the path to append.

      • isCurrentVersion

        public boolean isCurrentVersion()
        Check whether the path is not a version-ed path.
        Returns:
        true, if it is a non-version-ed path, false otherwise.

      • getPathWithVersion

        public String getPathWithVersion()
        Return the path with version, if there is no version, just return the path.
        Returns:
        the path with the version.

      • toString

        The path to string, same as getCompletePath
        Overrides:
        toString in class Object
        Returns:
        the string value of the path.
